name: HONEY
greetingText: I really like how you smile and also make you happy and special in a way.
wishText: I wish that this September will not be not so much for you and hope you really like this short but sweet message <3
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!~ You have grown so much and I'm proud of you for that and still holding on and not giving up!~
text2: I was gonna do a same boring letter like the usual
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something more extra and by that I actually mean like something
outroText: I Hope you liked it a lot and I did this to still to pursue you in a way cause tbh I still have feelings for you parin it never faded actually.
replayText: and click, if you want to watch it again.
